::Spears::

"What? Striker attacked Ramulus?"  She looked at them both and then 
at the floor. She put her hands to her head,"What happened? Why can't 
I remember?" 
She shook her head and felt a surge go trhough her programs. The 
trainer program had taken over the maximal program temporarily. The 
surge made her tremble slightly as a side affect of the surge. 

She looked up at Smokescreen.  "I think I remember now. Yeah, the 
trainers did do something to Striker.  He was chipped and taken to 
the lab. But, I can't remember much before or after that." her 
trainer side wanted to guide them in a direction that would throw 
them off as far as trying to help Slayer. She started to smile when 
the surge hit again and her maximal program took over again. The 
surge hit her and she trembled slightly.

She shook her head and held her hand up to the side of her head. Her 
maximal side wasn't aware of what her Trainer side did.
She looked up at Firearm and Smokescreen. She stood up and looked at 
them. "Uh, well, how can I help out? You said that Ramulus as hurt? 
Let's get him to a CR before he gets injured any further."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Smokescreen/Firearm::
> 
> Smokescreen shruggs. "I have no idea further than the fact that you 
> were taken over. But I'm also curious about Striker..."
> 
> Smokescreen looks at Firearm questioningly. Firearm raises an 
> eyebrow, looking at the two bots.
> 
> "Hey, I don't know much either. He flew into the battlefield, 
nearly 
> killed Ramulus, made a big mess of the ground with a dozen or so 
> missiles, killed a Maximal warrior, called himself Slayer, and flew 
> off with the rest of the Trainers. Other than that, I'm as clueless 
> as you guys."
>
